results.title: 24-Hour Public Weather Forecast: July 21, 2025
results.summary: A weather forecast from Civil Defense PH indicates a low-pressure area east of Luzon and Severe Tropical Storm Wipha impacting the Philippines. Monsoon rains are expected in Zambales, Bataan, and Occidental Mindoro, with occasional rains in Metro Manila and surrounding regions. The forecast warns of possible floods and landslides. "God is our refuge and strength, a very present help in trouble" (Psalm 46:1). Stay informed and seek the Lord's guidance during storms.

results.title: 7/20/25: SEVERE WEATHER ALERT! Thunderstorms Likely This Afternoon
results.summary: A weather alert from Sumner County Source warns of severe weather, including thunderstorms and a heat advisory with heat index values up to 108°F. Residents are advised to "Drink plenty of fluids, stay in an air-conditioned room, stay out of the sun, and check up on relatives and neighbors." This aligns with biblical teachings on caring for one's neighbor and being mindful of the seasons (Matthew 22:39, Ecclesiastes 3:1).
